title: Command Line Parser
description: A simple and light-weight parser for command line arguments, which makes it possible to access parameters from the command line via well-defined .NET data structures.

packOptions.releaseNotes: Improved the error handling of the command line parser. Lexical and syntactical errors can now be handled.
packOptions.summary: A simple and light-weight parser for command line arguments, which makes it possible to access parameters from the command line via well-defined .NET data structures.
